title: Great Clips CEO on Coronavirus Impact on Retail
itunes:title: Great Clips CEO on Coronavirus Impact on Retail
description:
Steve Hockett, CEO of Great Clips, discusses running the `intimate' salon business during the coronavirus outbreak. He also talks about how the cancellation of the NCAA tournament and NHL season is impacting the company's sponsorships.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
